00080 int run( int argc, char **argv )
00081 {
00082     struct command command_data;
00083 
00084     // Initialization
00085     init_board(BOARD_SIZE_DEFAULT);
00086     init_known_commands();
00087 
00088     // STDOUT must be unbuffered:
00089     setbuf( stdout, NULL );
00090 
00091     // Read command line arguments:
00092     read_opts( argc, argv );
00093 
00094     // Working loop:
00095     while ( quit_program == 0 ) {
00096         read_gtp_input(&command_data);
00097 
00098         // Ignore empty lines:
00099         if ( is_input_empty() == true ) {
00100             continue;
00101         }
00102 
00103         if ( get_output_error() == false ) {
00104             select_command(&command_data);
00105         }
00106 
00107         print_output(command_data.id);
00108     }
00109 
00110     free_board();
00111 
00112     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00113 }

00147 void read_opts( int argc, char **argv )
00148 {
00149     int opt;
00150 
00151     while ( ( opt = getopt( argc, argv, VALID_OPTIONS ) ) != -1 ) {
00152         switch (opt) {
00153             case 'h':
00154                 print_help_message();
00155                 set_quit_program();
00156                 break;
00157             case 'v':
00158                 print_version();
00159                 set_quit_program();
00160                 break;
00161             default:
00162                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166     return;
00167 }

00216 void init_known_commands(void)
00217 {
00218     int i = 0;
00219 
00220     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "protocol_version", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00221     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_protocol_version);
00222     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "name", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00223     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_name);
00224     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "version", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00225     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_version);
00226     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "known_command", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00227     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_known_command);
00228     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "list_commands", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00229     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_list_commands);
00230     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "quit", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00231     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_quit);
00232     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "boardsize", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00233     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_boardsize);
00234     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "clear_board", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00235     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_clear_board);
00236     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "komi", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00237     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_komi);
00238     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "play", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00239     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_play);
00240     my_strcpy( known_commands[i].command, "showboard", MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH );
00241     known_commands[i++].function = (*gtp_showboard);
00242 
00243     if ( i != COUNT_KNOWN_COMMANDS ) {
00244         fprintf(
00245             stdout
00246           , "Commands implemented: %d\nCOUNT_KNOWN_COMMANDS: %d\n"
00247           , i, COUNT_KNOWN_COMMANDS
00248         );
00249         exit(1);
00250     }
00251 
00252     return;
00253 }
00254 
00265 void select_command( struct command *command_data )
00266 {
00267     int  i;
00268     bool is_command = false;
00269 
00270     for ( i = 0; i < COUNT_KNOWN_COMMANDS; i++ ) {
00271         if ( strcmp( known_commands[i].command, command_data->name ) == 0 ) {
00272             is_command = true;
00273             known_commands[i].function( command_data->gtp_argc, command_data->gtp_argv );
00274             break;
00275         }
00276     }
00277 
00278     if ( is_command == false ) {
00279         set_output_error();
00280         add_output("unknown command");
00281     }
00282 
00283     return;
00284 }

00390 void gtp_known_command( int gtp_argc, char gtp_argv[][MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH] )
00391 {
00392     int  i;
00393     bool is_command_known = false;
00394 
00395     if ( gtp_argc < 1 ) {
00396         set_output_error();
00397         add_output( "missing argument: command_name" );
00398         return;
00399     }
00400     if ( gtp_argc > 1 ) {
00401         set_output_error();
00402         add_output( "only one argument required: command_name" );
00403         return;
00404     }
00405 
00406     for ( i = 0; i < COUNT_KNOWN_COMMANDS; i++ ) {
00407         if ( strcmp( known_commands[i].command, gtp_argv[0] ) == 0 ) {
00408             is_command_known = true;
00409             break;
00410         }
00411     }
00412 
00413     if ( is_command_known == true ) {
00414         add_output("true");
00415     }
00416     else {
00417         add_output("false");
00418     }
00419 
00420     return;
00421 }
00422 
00436 void gtp_list_commands( int gtp_argc, char gtp_argv[][MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH] )
00437 {
00438     int i;
00439 
00440     for ( i = 0; i < COUNT_KNOWN_COMMANDS; i++ ) {
00441         add_output( known_commands[i].command );
00442     }
00443 
00444     return;
00445 }

00463 void gtp_boardsize( int gtp_argc, char gtp_argv[][MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH] )
00464 {
00465     int board_size = (int) atoi( gtp_argv[0] );
00466 
00467     if ( board_size < BOARD_SIZE_MIN || board_size > BOARD_SIZE_MAX ) {
00468         set_output_error();
00469         add_output("unacceptable size");
00470         return;
00471     }
00472 
00473     free_board();
00474     init_board(board_size);
00475 
00476     return;
00477 }
00478

00495     int board_size = get_board_size();
00496 
00497     free_board();
00498     init_board(board_size);
00499 
00500     // number of captured stones must be set to zero
00501     // move history must be emptied
00502 
00503     return;
00504 }

00530 
00545 void gtp_play( int gtp_argc, char gtp_argv[][MAX_TOKEN_LENGTH] )
00546 {
00547     int color;
00548     int i, j;
00549 
00550     // Check if first argument is black or white:
00551     str_toupper( gtp_argv[0] );
00552     if ( strcmp( gtp_argv[0], "B" ) == 0 || strcmp( gtp_argv[0], "BLACK" ) == 0 ) {
00553         color = BLACK;
00554     }
00555     else if ( strcmp( gtp_argv[0], "W" ) == 0 || strcmp( gtp_argv[0], "WHITE" ) == 0 ) {
00556         color = WHITE;
00557     }
00558     else {
00559         set_output_error();
00560         add_output("invalid color");
00561         return;
00562     }
00563 
00564     // Check vertex if first coordinate is valid:
00565     i = (int) toupper( gtp_argv[1][0] ) - 65;
00566     if ( i > 8 ) {
00567         i--;
00568     }
00569     if ( i < 0 || i >= get_board_size() ) {
00570         set_output_error();
00571         add_output("invalid coordinate");
00572         return;
00573     }
00574 
00575     // Check if second coordinate is valid:
00576     gtp_argv[1][0] = ' ';
00577     j = (int) atoi( gtp_argv[1] );
00578     j--;
00579     if ( j < 0 || j >= get_board_size() ) {
00580         set_output_error();
00581         add_output("invalid coordinate");
00582         return;
00583     }
00584 
00585     set_vertex( color, i, j );
00586 
00589 
00590     return;
00591 }
